title: Deaths per day in West African countries with 2014 Ebola outbreak by disease
summary: This is a bar chart representing Diseases in the x axis and Number of deaths per day in the y axis.
The Number of deaths per day is highest at Diseases HIV/AIDS and lowest at Diseases Ebola.
Diseases HIV/AIDS has 171.25 times more Number of deaths per day than Diseases Ebola which is has the lowest.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of deaths per day for 6 number of Diseasess.
Diseases HIV/AIDS has the highest Number of deaths per day and Ebola has the lowest Number of deaths per day.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Diseases in the x axis and Number of deaths per day in the y axis.
The Number of deaths per day is highest at Diseases HIV/AIDS and lowest at Diseases Ebola.
Diseases HIV/AIDS has 171.25 times more Number of deaths per day than Diseases Ebola which is has the lowest.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of deaths per day for 6 number of Diseasess.
Diseases HIV/AIDS has the highest Number of deaths per day and Ebola has the lowest Number of deaths per day.
Diseases Malaria has the second highest value for Number of deaths per day.
The minimum Diseases Ebola has got 171.25 times less Number of deaths per day than the maximum Diseases HIV/AIDS.
Number of deaths per day at Diseases HIV/AIDS is 685.0 , second place is Malaria at 552.0, and thirdly is Diarrhoea at 404.0.
The Diseases HIV/AIDS tends to be 2.32 percent higher than average.
